scripts.build:js:minify: terser static/js/shared.js -o static/js/shared.min.js -c -m && terser static/js/transactions.js -o static/js/transactions.min.js -c -m && terser static/js/accounts.js -o static/js/accounts.min.js -c -m && terser static/js/categories.js -o static/js/categories.min.js -c -m && terser static/js/profile.js -o static/js/profile.min.js -c -m && terser static/js/toasts.js -o static/js/toasts.min.js -c -m
scripts.build:minify: npm run build:css:minify && npm run build:js:minify
